content.description: In a study on seed germination of radish seeds, five beakers were set up containing equal numbers of seeds. The beakers were subjected to the conditions indicated in the table below.
content.question: Comparing results from which of the following pairs of beakers would help determine if enzymes are necessary for germination?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
